attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day a new petition lands in my inbox, usually along the lines of 'FW: OMG THEY R GOING 2 BAN BREAKDANCING!!!!' etc. 

The petitions are often full of half-truths and distorted facts written by a moron and will be signed in droves by idiots who haven't even bothered to find out what it's about. 

Besides, we all know petitions don't actually achieve anything anyway. So stop kidding yourself that you are making a difference. STOP. NOW.

ban this filth from my inbox immediately, Tony.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
